channel.description: Recent content on davegallant.github.io - tech micro-blog

item.title: Why Learn Python?
item.description: Python is a high-level, general-purpose language that has a wide range of use cases from the mundanely simple to the increasingly complex.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello. My plan is to pour useful code snippets, tips and tricks into these pages. I have a fond interest in programming (especially with Python, TypeScript and Golang). Hopefully something within these pages will help you out in your journey.

item.title: About
item.description: I work as a software developer in the realm of security. I have a passion for open-source, automation, and economics. I enjoy running, music and spending time with my family.
